name: ePermissions
author: Ahmed Alkatheeri

sections.description:
ePermissions plugin allows you to manage your members (who have Editor role) and you can make for them capabilities that you choose only for them.

Also, you can use ePermissions plugin to choose any permission added by this plugin to select some roles or options for editors on your blog. Permissions

have 6 options about editors such as, controlling in links, comments, posts, pages and files uploaded. Motioned options are currently available as

ePermissions, these options are giving you the ability to show/hide some available capabilities for Editor role in WordPress platform.

In this version, Arabic and English are the available languages . If your WordPress version is English then ePermission language will be English

automatically. The same goes for the Arabic.

Features

  • Hide and show capabilities in sidebar.

  • Disallow access to capabilities pages. (if the permission has capabilities that considered as unchecked where is not allowed)

  • You can write a permission message for a member who has permission, and the message will be on the top of admin pages. (this is optional field, I will try to improve current message shape)

  • You can open and close the permission, and the member who has closed permission can get all capabilities. (For Editor role)

You can send me an email for any suggestions about ePermissions plugin at: mobde3net[at]gmail.com.
sections.installation:
• Upload ePermissions plugin to WordPress ⁐lugin†directory and unzip it.

  • Activate ePermissions plugin.

  • After that the plugin will be Ready to use!

How to create new permission? Easy steps ..

  • Click add new permission

  • Write an important fields (permission name, permission description, permission status and permission features)

  • Submit the the form and then permission will be added!
